text:
Aloïse Moudileno Massengo (11 March 1933 – 6 January 2020) was a Congolese politician and lawyer. He served as Vice President of the Republic of the Congo from 1971 to 1972. He has been called the first Congolese lawyer. He was born in Vindza District.
Moudileno Massengo died on 6 January 2020 in the French city of Nancy. He was 86.

annotations.surface_form: Vice President of the Republic of the Congo
